TEXT: There is a great horror beneath the manor: NL A Crawling Chaos that must be destroyed!

Navigating an unlit street, you come across several hooded figures in the midst of some dark ritual. As you approach, they turn to you in eerie unison. The oldest among them steps forward  and extends a long, pale hand towards you. NL ~You still foolishly consider yourself an entity separate from the whole, I know better. And I. Will. Show you.
